data.title: Charles Grayson Meaning & Pronunciation
data.meta_description: Charles Grayson means 'Manly,  Strong,  Free Man'. Learn how to pronounce Charles Grayson with our 15 audio pronunciations and discover its popularity in United States of America and 97 more countries.
data.text:
Charles Name Popularity

At NamesLook, the name Charles is recorded 130,734 times globally, ranking it as the 428th most common name worldwide.

Charles is most prevalent in United States of America, with 39,686 occurrences, making it the 113th most popular name in the country.
